article.title: ArgoUML
article.paragraph:
Infobox softwareArgoUML
[[Image:ArgoUML.png|250px]] ArgoUML screenshot
April 1999 0.34 {{release date and age|2011|12|14}}
cross-platform (Java) [[Software development]], [[UML Tool]] [[Eclipse Public License|Eclipse Public License 1.0]] http://argouml.tigris.org .zargo ArgoUMLis anUnified Modeling LanguageUMLdiagramming application written in Java and released under theopen sourceEclipse Public License. By virtue of being aJava (programming language)Javaapplication, it is available on any platform supported by Java.
article.heading: History
article.paragraph: ArgoUML was originally developed atUniversity of California, IrvineUC Irvineby Jason E. Robbins, leading to hisDoctor of PhilosophyPh.D.It is now an open source project hosted byTigris.org. The ArgoUML project now includes more than 19,000 registered users and over 150 developers.cite webhttp://www.isr.uci.edu/tech-transition.htmlTech Transitions at ISR UCI

In 2003, ArgoUML won the Software Development Magazine's annual Readers' Choice Award in the Design and Analysis Tools category.cite webhttp://www.ddj.com/architect/184414997#designtoolsDr. Dobb's Readers' Choice Awards, 2003
ArgoUML development has suffered from lack of manpower. For example,Undohas been a perpetually requested feature since 2003 but has not been implemented yet.Citation neededJanuary 2011
article.heading: Features
article.paragraph: According to the official feature list,cite webhttp://argouml.tigris.org/features.htmlArgoUML FeaturesArgoUML is capable of the following:

list.listitem: Click and Go! with Java Web Start (no setup required, starts from your web browser).
Export diagrams asGIF,Portable Network GraphicsPNG,PostScriptPS,Encapsulated PostScriptEPS,PGMLandSVG.
Available in ten languages: EN, EN-GB, DE, ES, IT, RU, FR, NB, PT, ZH.
Built-in design critics provide unobtrusive review of design and suggestions for improvements.
Forward engineering (code generation supports C++ and C#, Java, PHP 4, PHP 5, Ruby and, with less mature modules, Ada, Delphi and SQL).

article.heading: Weaknesses

list.listitem: ArgoUML does not yet completely implement the UML standard.cite webhttp://argouml.tigris.org/documentation/umlsupport/index.htmlArgoUML documentationUML Specification Incompatibility list

Partial undo feature (working for graphics editscite webhttp://argouml.tigris.org/servlets/NewsItemView?newsItemIDArgoUML 0.19.3 released Undo working for graphics edits (this is mostly a GEF addition).cite webhttp://argouml.tigris.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?idIssue 1834. Implement undo Undo working for graphics edits (this is mostly a GEF addition).)
